CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Contract_Type__c))), IF( ISPICKVAL(Contract_Type__c, "Monthly"), ( Total_Monthly_Amount_For_Deposit__c * 1.5)*1.18, IF( Desk_Count_For_Deposit__c <= 20, ( Total_Monthly_Amount_For_Deposit__c * 1.5)*1.18, IF( Desk_Count_For_Deposit__c <= 75, IF( FLOOR( ((YEAR(End_Date__c) - YEAR(Start_Date__c)) * 12) + MONTH(End_Date__c) - MONTH(Start_Date__c) ) <= 12, (Total_Monthly_Amount_For_Deposit__c * 2)*1.18, (Total_Monthly_Amount_For_Deposit__c * 3)*1.18 ), ( Total_Monthly_Amount_For_Deposit__c * 4)*1.18 ) ) ), 0 )
CustomField.label: Calculated Deposit
